title: Tin Foil Hat #39: Shroomin With 2Mex
description:
Welcome to another fun and spectacular episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome Legendary LA Underground Hip Hop superstar, 2Mex! This episode we discuss....
1)2Mex's new album "Lospital!"
2)The LA Hip Hop Underground
3) The Hip Hop Industry and the Prison System
4)The Death of Pop Culture
5) DMT and the Pineal Gland
6) The Vatican and The Nazis
7) We read your iTunes reviews
Please check out Tin Foil Hat on the inter web
1) AllComedyTshirts.com
2) Twitter.com at @Madhatter39ers
3) Instagram at @TinFoilHatpod
4)Reddit at Reddit.com/TinFoilHatshow
5)Youtube.com at youtube.com/SamTripoli
itunes:author: Sam Tripoli
